fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bll.interfaces

Interface PickupManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PickupManagerImpl

    public interface PickupManager
    Interface used for implementing pickup place manager class.

    This interface defines all the specific methods that must be implemented to manage pickup place items. Methods present in the interface implementation are allowed to use as many as data access objects required to accomplish their goal. The access of one of data access object method by the controllers is strictly forbidden.

    See Also:
    add(Item, String, String, String), find(Item), update(PickupPlace, HashMap), delete(PickupPlace)

    • Method Detail

      • setManagerFactory

        void setManagerFactory(ManagerFactory managerFactory)
        Set the manager factory.

        This method retrieves the manager factory to allow the instance methods to access others managers.

        Parameters:
        managerFactory - Manager factory instance.

      • add

        PickupPlace add(Item item,
                java.lang.String street,
                java.lang.String zipCode,
                java.lang.String city)
         throws ModelException
        Create a pickup place.

        This method create a pickup place and save it into the persistence unit. The newly created pickup place is attached to the supplied item after successfully saved.

        Parameters:
        item - Item to add the pickup place to
        street - Street where to pick up the item.
        zipCode - Zip code where to pick up the item.
        city - City to pick up the item.
        Returns:
        The newly created pickup place.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem.

      • find

        PickupPlace find(@NotNull
                 @NotNull Item item)
          throws ModelException
        Find the pickup place that belong to an item.

        This method find the pickup place related to the item supplied in parameter. If no pickup place is found, that means the item should be picked up at the seller address.

        Parameters:
        item - Item for which finding the pickup place.
        Returns:
        Found pickup place.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem or if nothing is found.

      • update

        void update(@NotNull
            @NotNull PickupPlace pickupPlace,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> properties)
     throws ModelException
        Update pickup place properties.

        This method update the properties of the supplied pickup place. Each property new value should be supplied as a pair of key/value, a key representing the exact name of the pickup place property, including case. If a key as an undefined property name, an exception is generated.

        Parameters:
        pickupPlace - Pickup place to be updated.
        properties - Pickup place properties to update.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem.

      • delete

        void delete(@NotNull
            @NotNull PickupPlace pickupPlace)
     throws ModelException
        Delete a pickup place.

        This method delete a pickup place from the persistence unit. Once the pickup place is deleted, his previously attached item is updated too.

        Parameters:
        pickupPlace - Pickup place to delete
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem.
